com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action3.Name: 语音转换器开/关
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action3.Tooltip: 点击打开或者关闭语音转换器

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action4.Name: 听见自己的声音开/关
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action4.Tooltip: 点击打开或者关闭听见自己的声音

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action5.Name: 背景效果开/关
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action5.Tooltip: 点击打开或者关闭背景效果

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action6.Name: 静音开/关
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action6.Tooltip: 点击打开或者关闭静音

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action7.Name: 即时哔哔声
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action7.Tooltip: 按下按键重现麦克风检查器哔哔声

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action8.Name: 推送到语音转换器
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action8.Tooltip: 按住按键开启语音转换器，松开关闭

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action9.Name: 音板播放
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action9.Tooltip: 此操作播放soundboard的音频文件

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action10.Name: 停止所有模因播放
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action10.Tooltip: 此操作将暂停所有正在播放的模因

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action11.Name: 为我静音开/关
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action11.Tooltip: 此操作将切换为我静音按钮状态
